row.process:
:INCLUDE PCK.AUTOMIC_TOMCAT.PRV.INCLUDE.ATTACH :INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.CHECK_SHELL_CMD@UNIX :INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.CHANGE_DIRECTORY_TO_AGENT_BIN
:SET &UC4RB_CONVERTED_STRING# = &UC4RB_TC_HOME_DIR# :INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.CONVERT_SLASHES_UNIX_STYLE :SET &UC4RB_TC_HOME_DIR# = &UC4RB_CONVERTED_STRING#
!-------------------- Remove Resource in server.xml -------------------------- echo "Check if server.xml exist in &UC4RB_TC_HOME_DIR#/conf" java -jar "&$AGENT_RESOURCES_CLIENT#/tomcat-tool.jar" XML ValidateDocument -xml "&UC4RB_TC_HOME_DIR#/conf/server.xml" RC=$? if [ "$RC" -gt "1" ] ; then exit $RC; fi
resource=$(java -jar "&$AGENT_RESOURCES_CLIENT#/tomcat-tool.jar" XML ExecutePath -xml "&UC4RB_TC_HOME_DIR#/conf/server.xml" -x '//Server/GlobalNamingResources/Resource[@name="&UC4RB_TC_DS_NAME#"]' -filter all | grep "Return code: 0")
if [ -n "$resource" ] ; then
echo "Resource &UC4RB_TC_DS_NAME# exists" else echo "Resource &UC4RB_TC_DS_NAME# does not exist" exit 1 fi
java -jar "&$AGENT_RESOURCES_CLIENT#/tomcat-tool.jar" XML DeleteElement -xml "&UC4RB_TC_HOME_DIR#/conf/server.xml" -x '//Server/GlobalNamingResources/Resource[@name="&UC4RB_TC_DS_NAME#"]' -filter all :INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.CHECK_SHELL_CMD@UNIX
!-------------------- Check if resource is dropped -------------------------- echo "Check if resource &UC4RB_TC_DS_NAME# is deleted" resource=$(java -jar "&$AGENT_RESOURCES_CLIENT#/tomcat-tool.jar" XML ExecutePath -xml "&UC4RB_TC_HOME_DIR#/conf/server.xml" -x '//Server/GlobalNamingResources/Resource[@name="&UC4RB_TC_DS_NAME#"]' -filter all | grep "Return code: 0")
if [ -n "$resource" ] ; then echo "Resource &UC4RB_TC_DS_NAME# is not created. Job fail" exit 2
else echo "Resource &UC4RB_TC_DS_NAME# dropped" fi
!-------------------- Remove Resource Link in context.xml -------------------------- :IF &UC4RB_TC_RES_LINKS# = "YES"
echo "Check if context.xml exists in &UC4RB_TC_HOME_DIR#/conf" java -jar "&$AGENT_RESOURCES_CLIENT#/tomcat-tool.jar" XML ValidateDocument -xml "&UC4RB_TC_HOME_DIR#/conf/context.xml" RC=$? if [ "$RC" -gt "1" ] ; then exit $RC; fi
resource_link=$(java -jar "&$AGENT_RESOURCES_CLIENT#/tomcat-tool.jar" XML ExecutePath -xml "&UC4RB_TC_HOME_DIR#/conf/context.xml" -x '//Context/ResourceLink[@name="&UC4RB_TC_DS_NAME#"]' -filter all | grep "Return code: 0") :INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.CHECK_SHELL_CMD@UNIX
if [ -n "$resource_link" ] ; then
echo "Resource Link &UC4RB_TC_DS_NAME# exists" java -jar "&$AGENT_RESOURCES_CLIENT#/tomcat-tool.jar" XML DeleteElement -xml "&UC4RB_TC_HOME_DIR#/conf/context.xml" -x '/Context/ResourceLink[@name="&UC4RB_TC_DS_NAME#"]' -filter all else echo "Resource Link &UC4RB_TC_DS_NAME# does not exist" exit 0 fi
!-------------------- Check if resource link is dropped -------------------------- echo "Check if resource link &UC4RB_TC_DS_NAME# is dropped" resource_link=$(java -jar "&$AGENT_RESOURCES_CLIENT#/tomcat-tool.jar" XML ExecutePath -xml "&UC4RB_TC_HOME_DIR#/conf/context.xml" -x '//Context/ResourceLink[@name="&UC4RB_TC_DS_NAME#"]' -filter all | grep "Return code: 0")
if [ -n "$resource_link" ] ; then echo "Resource Link &UC4RB_TC_DS_NAME# still exists. Job fail" exit 2 else echo "Resource Link &UC4RB_TC_DS_NAME# is dropped" exit 0 fi
:ELSE exit 0 :ENDIF
